Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Flap extension asymmetry. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 07/10/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh
